column4: Moc22: Natty and upgrades to it are not supported in #ubuntu. Please use #ubuntu+1 for this.
They're different ISOs. 10.04.2 is 10.04.1 plus all the security updates released since 10.04.1.
rtl8187 uses modules named 'wl' or 'b43', depending on which driver you go with.
oh, wait, no, I'm getting mixed up between my two computers >.>
